ul.li: A progressive and well-rounded education in the liberal arts & sciences
Advanced courses in mathematics, science, the humanities, and the visual & performing arts
One of the largest middle school athletic programs in Brooklyn
An extended day for elective courses and enrichment

div.div: We empower students as scholars and citizens so they may lead fulfilling academic, personal and professional lives

We have a rigorous curriculum in the arts & sciences
